Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Thorndale
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.
